ingredients.item: 300g pack 2 chicken breast fillets, cut into thick strips
2 x 150g packs Amoy Straight To Wok Ribbon Rice Noodles

instructions.step: Place the chicken and stock in a large saucepan and bring to the boil, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the white parts of the pak choi and the pepper, cover and cook for 3 minutes.
Add the noodles, soy sauce and green parts of the pak choi and cook for 2 minutes until the chicken is cooked throughout, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat.
